entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrksDescription
entry.value: Steel Legionnaires are 17% more accurate against Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonOrksFlavor
entry.value: Facing the Greentide on Armageddon taught the Steel Legion the best ways to exterminate Orks.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentDescription
entry.value: Grants bonus traits when this unit disembarks from a transport.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentFlavor
entry.value: Steel Legionnaires are renowned for their swift assaults, where they spill out from their Chimeras

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentDamageFlavor
entry.value: The Steel Legion frequently uses rapid deployment from Chimeras to strike the enemy before they can react.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentDamageReductionFlavor
entry.value: The Steel Legion has learned how to exit an APC swiftly yet safely while under fire.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentHealingRateDescription
entry.value: Increases the healing rate when this unit is embarked in a vehicle.

entry.name: AstraMilitarum/ArmageddonDeploymentHealingRateFlavor
entry.value: Steel Legion Medics have discovered more efficient packing methods for first aid kits to store inside their transports.
